title: 172用命令方块指令在指定位置放置多个方块
txt_content: 想做一个半自动的掘一死战的场地，激活命令方块后能自动填充场地，求大神告诉我指令

replies.author: amz00112
replies.txt_content: /setblock x y z 方块标签

replies.author: BensonQC
replies.txt_content:
输入命令：
/fill <x1> <y1> <z1> <x2> <y2> <z2> <TileName> [dataValue] [oldBlockHandling] [dataTag]复制代码
详见http://minecraft-zh.gamepedia.com/%E5%91%BD%E4%BB%A4#fill

replies.author: MsYqgzt
replies.txt_content: 1.7.2只能用setblock x y z ID的方式，1.8可用fill x1 y1 z1 x2 y2 z2 ID填充指定区域
